price: Günü gelince biz onları bırakırız. Dalgalar halinde birbirlerine girerler. Sur’a üflendiği zaman da hepsini bir araya toplarız.
arabic: ۞ وَتَرَكۡنَا بَعۡضَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَمُوجُ فِي بَعۡضٖۖ وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَجَمَعۡنَٰهُمۡ جَمۡعٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wataraknā baʿḍahum yawma-idhin yamūju fī baʿḍin wanufikha fī al-ṣūri fajamaʿnāhum jamʿan
